pros: participate in Record Store Day and host live bands
cons: staff can be less interested in customers

notable_quotes.best: One of my favorite record stores in Philly. I try to stop by everytime I'm in town. They always have deep cuts and incredible selections.
notable_quotes.worst: Not a huge fan. Limited selection of records and highly overpriced.
notable_quotes.funniest: Sales staff were more interested in bsing with each other

vibe_description: Creep Records is described as having a 'chill vibe' by one reviewer, while another mentions the shop has a 'relaxed atmosphere'. The overall tone of the reviews suggests a welcoming and community-focused environment.
staff_mentions: Staff are generally friendly and helpful, but some reviewers mention that they can be less interested in customers than others.
recommendation_for: fans of jazz, punk, and indie rock music, as well as those looking for a unique shopping experience with a community-focused atmosphere.
